rewrite (crE sc) at 1; relsf; unionL.
by generalize (@hb_trans G); basic_solver 21.

rewrite (f_sc_hb_f_sc_in_sc WF WF_SC ACYC_EXT).
generalize (sc_trans WF_SC).
rewrite (dom_r (wf_scD WF_SC)) at 3.
basic_solver 21.
